original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: You have not done the things that you promised to do when I made a covenant with you. So I will punish you as you deserve.
korean_text: 나 주 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 네가 맹세를 멸시하여 언약을 배반하였은즉 내가 네 행한 대로 네게 행하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
You have not done the things that you promised to do
when I made a covenant with you.
So I will punish you as you deserve.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 당신이 마땅히 받을 벌을 내리겠습니다
